roleset.name: to discuss again
roleset.note: REHASH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'rehash' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from rehash.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: [The two men]-1 spent an hour at Exit 10 , [*-1]rehashing the event , `` [*-1] fulfilling the lifelong dream of a young boy now turned [*] 50 , '' Mr. Engelken says [*T*-2] .
